abstract: Also, Kevin Clash, the puppeteer and voice behind Elmo on “Sesame Street,” resigns after a new allegation that he had an underage sexual relationship.
snippet: Also, Kevin Clash, the puppeteer and voice behind Elmo on “Sesame Street,” resigns after a new allegation that he had an underage sexual relationship.
lead_paragraph: The main players in the Petraeus scandal have signed up Washington-based consultants to manage events as they unspool, Scott Shane reports. Among the mix of responsibilities these consultants have, he writes, are to “watch for legal trouble, police the news media and massage damaged reputations.” So far, the pairings are as follows:

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Managing the Petraeus Scandal, and Fiona Apple’s Loyalty to Her Dog
